LanguageData.Make_Veggie_Meal.label: make vegetarian medley
LanguageData.Make_Veggie_Meal.description: Artfully prepare some potatoes and corn together for extra satisfaction. A Momu favorite!
LanguageData.Make_Lavish_Veggie_Meal.label: make lavish vegetarian medley
LanguageData.Make_Lavish_Veggie_Meal.description: Adds a dash of sunflower oil to a vegetarian meal to make it delicious! A Momu Lavish Meal.
